metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28601 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsing functionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability exists in Nef_2/PM_io_parser.h PM_io_parser::read_vertex() Face_of[] OOB read. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

notes.Note: sbeattie> possible regression introduced by fix, see GH issue 5514

criterions.comment: cgal: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
